Comment: Trump has his desires and his whims and he has the advice and direction of those who would make the U.S. into a Fascist country.  But there are also those who oppose him and his own incompetencies that stand in his way.  Much goes on behind closed doors and most of us know little of what happens there.  [Trump hosts Walmart, Target and Home Depot CEOs for tariff meeting](https://www.nbcnews.com/business/business-news/trump-host-walmart-ceo-target-home-depot-execs-wh-tariff-meeting-rcna202212).  At first I assumed these major importers were summoned to the oval office to kiss Trump's ring - but after seeing Trump's comments today about easing tariffs against China, I now suspect these three came together in solidarity to issue to Trump a warning.  They warned him of how badly it was about to look to Americans when major stores started to have empty shelves as a result of tariffs so high that they amounted to bans against trade.  I think that image of empty shelves got through to Trump at least a little bit.  The road back to democracy is by no means certain - but neither is our descent into Fascism complete - at least not yet.
Author: Truthisnotallowed
